按钮样式
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default btn-flat">直角</button>
  
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default">（默认样式）Default</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">（首选项）Primary</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-success">（成功）Success</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default">（一般信息）Info</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-warning">（警告）Warning</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">（危险）Danger</button>
  
<button type="button" class="btn-dark btn-dark-default">default</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn-dark btn-dark-warning">warning</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn-dark btn-dark-success">success</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn-dark btn-dark-danger">danger</button>
  
<button type="button" class="btn btn-thick btn-default">default</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-thick btn-warning">warning</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-thick btn-success">success</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-thick btn-danger">danger</button>
按钮示例
<button type="button" class="btn btn-dark-default btn-thick" >
    <span class="fa fa-arrow-circle-left"></span> 上一步
</button>    

<button type="button" class="btn btn-success btn-thick" >
    下一步<span class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></span>
</button>
按钮尺寸
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default btn-xs">（超小尺寸）Extra small button</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default btn-sm">（小按钮）Small button</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default">（默认尺寸）Default button</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default btn-lg">（大按钮）Large button</button>
按钮状态
<button type="button" class="btn btn-info">（默认）</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-info active">（激活）active</button>
 
<button type="button" class="btn btn-info disabled">（禁用）disabled</button>
